p: Similarly, for hospital acquired infections in COVID-19 patients a recurring observation is the predominance for bacterial and fungal infection to occur in critical care.[ 13] Ventilator associated pneumonia appears to be a predominant hospital acquired infection reported in the literature.[ 4, 13] Invasive fungal infection has also been highlighted as a concern in critically unwell patients with COVID-19.[ 14] Additionally, increased rates of contaminants in blood and line culture are commonly reported.[ 9].
